search_text: Search for recipes, and you will get the information about them.
about_app_text: This application was created by Deary, Saman, Muhammad Ahmed. They used Spoonacular API to create this app.
deary: Deary Ismail is a student in the Computer Science Department. Who created this app with Saman and Mohamed.
saman: Saman Fatih is a student in the Computer Science Department. Who created this app with Deary and Mohamed.
muhamad: Mohamed Ahmad is a student in the Computer Science Department. Who created this app with Saman and Deary.
search_detail_title: This is the recipe from spoonacular api
search_detail: This recipe is from spoonacular website, Spoonacular is a food API may analyze recipe costs and nutritional values, classify foods into allergens, compute meal plans, etc
